item.description:
Hey it's last minute, but if you don't already have plans don't be stuck home. Come on out & join us for drinks, food (if you wish) & good conversation and company at the Horseshoe Pub. This place has a great selection of beer for you beer lovers. There is plenty of FREE parking an NO cover charge. As always, everyone pays for their own food & drinks.

If everyone wants afterwards, we can head to Speakers CLub in Marlboro only if everyone wants more of a club setting versus pub. See you tonight!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a rust/orange colored knit shirt
item.name: 3/28 - Sat night Last Minute meetup at the Horseshoe Pub in Hudson, MA
